ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] [egbarts] Changing computers
ygData.msgSnippet: Your .opt files Any pictures (.bmp) you want to keep How long it takes to get patched depends on your connection speed. We have DSL and downloading all the
ygData.messageBody:
Your .opt files
Any pictures (.bmp) you want to keep

How long it takes to get patched depends on your connection speed.
We have DSL and downloading all the patches last night took about 10
minutes.
You'll have to shut down and restart Everquest several times.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 14 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 19 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 11 Meditatin' HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro
(Commonlands)
